issue.title: [Release] Missing R binary packages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17232](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17232). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Seems like the binary upload script now expects some R binaries to upload, but the `packaging` crossbow task group doesn't contain any relevant tasks. 

I assume the `r-binary-packages` should be added to the `packaging` group. 

cc `[~kou]` `[~raulcd]` `[~assignUser]`
